title: Ebro In The Morning - More NFL Racism + Black ISH Wednesday
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning - this episode aired on 2/2/2022.

Ebro, Rosenberg, Laura Stylez, and the crew are in the studio talking about Whoopi Goldberg's suspension from the View, Brian Flores's NFL Racism claims, and now it's Black ISH Wednesday! All that and more on Ebro In The Morning! 

Click here to learn about the Hot 97 - Securing the Future initiative. 

Please like and subscribe to Ebro In The Morning.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
